response_text:
ET Canada - GlobalTV.com: Global Television Official Site http://blogs.etcanada.com ET Canada - GlobalTV.com: Global Television Official Site Fri, 13 May 2016 04:01:54 +0000 en-US hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=4.2.2 Gene Simmons’ Wife Shannon Tweed Blasts KISS Bandmade Paul Stanley Over Prince Tweet http://blogs.etcanada.com/gene-simmons-wife-blasts-kiss-bandmade-paul-stanley-over-prince-tweets/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/gene-simmons-wife-blasts-kiss-bandmade-paul-stanley-over-prince-tweets/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 03:56:16 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195375 After the sudden passing of Prince, celebrities have spoken out about their appreciation of the iconic musician. Gene Simmons on the other hand, had a less reverential comment to make, calling Prince’s death “pathetic.”

RELATED: Gene Simmons Apologizes For Calling Prince’s Death ‘Pathetic’

In a recent interview with “Newsweek”, the KISS rocker stated: “How pathetic that [Prince] killed himself. Don’t kid yourself, that’s what he did. Slowly, I’ll grant you… but that’s what drugs and alcohol is: a slow death.”

In response to the controversial comment, Simmons’ longtime bandmate Paul Stanley quickly took to Twitter to apologize on Simmons’ behalf, claiming he was “embarrassed by the cold, clueless statements.”

Embarrassed by cold clueless statements re Prince’s death. Without all the facts better to say nothing. My apologies https://t.co/Arb5XQ4o7l

— Paul Stanley (@PaulStanleyLive) May 10, 2016

Simmons later issued his own apology, stating: “I just got such s**t from my family for my big mouth again. I apologize — I have a long history at getting very angry at drug users because of my experience being around them coming up in the rock scene.”

RELATED: Prince’s Canadian Ex-Wife Mourns His Loss: ‘I Am Heartbroken’

Adding to the mix was Simmons’ wife Shannon Tweed, who slammed Stanley for throwing her husband “under the bus” after their 40-year partnership. Stanley, however, replied that it was their long friendship that compelled him to respond, pointing out that “partners of 40 years says it all… My apology was right”

We ALL have our failings but true friends don’t point at them & throw you under the bus! Especially partners of 40 years!

— Mrs ShannonTSimmons (@shannonleetweed) May 11, 2016

Partners of 40 years says it all. Don’t confuse walking under the bus with being thrown under. My apology was right. https://t.co/FF9dG6Tfo1

— Paul Stanley (@PaulStanleyLive) May 11, 2016

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/gene-simmons-wife-blasts-kiss-bandmade-paul-stanley-over-prince-tweets/feed/ 0 New Trailer For Ben Affleck Action-Thiller ‘The Accountant’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/new-trailer-for-ben-affleck-action-thiller-the-accountant/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/new-trailer-for-ben-affleck-action-thiller-the-accountant/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 03:03:21 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195370 Excitement is in the air as Ben Affleck ventures away from his superhero role, and there’s a new trailer to prove it!

RELATED: Ben Affleck And Jennifer Garner Spark Reconciliation Rumours On Paris Trip

In the all-new action-thriller “The Accountant,” Affleck plays a socially awkward accountant named Christian Wolff, who secretly works as the money man for a dangerous criminal organization.

Playing Affleck’s female counterpart is 30-year-old actress Anna Kendrick as the young, innocent accounting clerk at a robotics company, who uncovers a million-dollar discrepancy that forces her character into the risky double life.

RELATED: Ben Affleck Compares Jennifer Garner To A Superhero

The film, which was directed by Gavin O’Connor, contains a strong supporting cast, including Jon Bernthal, John Lithgow, Jeffery Tambor and J.K Simmons.

‘The Accountant” is set to hit theaters this fall, on October 14. Watch the trailer below:

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/new-trailer-for-ben-affleck-action-thiller-the-accountant/feed/ 0 WATCH: Carrie Underwood Premieres New Video For ‘Church Bells’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/watch-carrie-underwood-premieres-new-video-for-church-bells/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/watch-carrie-underwood-premieres-new-video-for-church-bells/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 02:56:29 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195367 Carrie Underwood has just released the music video for her chart topping song “Church Bells”, and it’s a dazzler.

RELATED: One On One With Carrie Underwood: Reveals Hubby Mike Fisher Doesn’t Know Her Songs, More!

The beautiful video showcases the country star as she sings the song during her Storyteller Tour. The video, which was directed by Wayne Isham, was shot during her concert in Lincoln, Nebraska.

Underwood doesn’t disappoint, with her vocals and performance leaving us with all the feels — as always.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/watch-carrie-underwood-premieres-new-video-for-church-bells/feed/ 0 Katy Perry Calls The Orlando Bloom And Selena Gomez Rumours A ‘Dumb Conspiracy’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/katy-perry-calls-the-orlando-bloom-and-selena-gomez-rumors-a-dumb-conspiracy/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/katy-perry-calls-the-orlando-bloom-and-selena-gomez-rumors-a-dumb-conspiracy/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 01:56:34 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195361 In standard Katy Perry fashion, the “Roar” singer tweeted another cryptic message on Thursday that seemed to discredit the rumours about her boyfriend Orlando Bloom and Selena Gomez.

“Instead of giving energy and eyeballs to dumb conspiracy, check out how cool this is,” Perry tweeted along with a link to a Time article about Bloom’s efforts as a UNICEF goodwill ambassador.

Instead of giving energy & eyeballs to dumb conspiracy check out how CL this is: https://t.co/ClmGlPMz3x #dontfeedthebeast

— KATY PERRY (@katyperry) May 12, 2016

WATCH: Selena Gomez and Orlando Bloom Spotted Getting ‘Physical’ in Las Vegas Club

Romance rumours between Bloom and Gomez were reignited earlier this week when the two were spotted getting close inside LIGHT nightclub in Las Vegas over the weekend.

“There was leg touching, hugging, talking closely, but no one saw kissing,” an eyewitness told ET. “They definitely did not leave together.”

A source insists to ET that Bloom, 39, and Gomez, 23, are just friends.

Perry’s latest tweet follows a cryptic subtweet on Wednesday, in which the 31-year-old pop star shared a link to Peggy Lee’s “Is That All There Is?.”

WATCH: Katy Perry Tweets a Very Pointed Song Following Orlando Bloom and Selena Gomez Club Pics

 

Is that all there is? https://t.co/54Q72MfXND

— KATY PERRY (@katyperry) May 12, 2016

“And then I fell in love, with the most wonderful boy in the world,” Lee sings in the jazz staple.

“We would take long walks by the river
Or just sit for hours gazing into each other’s eyes.
We were so very much in love.
Then one day, he went away and I thought I’d die.
But I didn’t.
And when I didn’t I said to myself, ‘Is that all there is to love?'”

Before this week’s drama, a source told ET that Perry and Bloom were “head over heels for each other.”

WATCH: Selena Gomez Admits She’s Dating But Doesn’t ‘Trust Anybody,’ Says Her Weakness Is ‘Bad Boys’

“Katy and Orlando are the real deal and are totally in love,” the source said. “We’ve never seen Katy this happy and so smitten.”

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/katy-perry-calls-the-orlando-bloom-and-selena-gomez-rumors-a-dumb-conspiracy/feed/ 0 Sharon And Ozzy Share ‘World’s Most Uncomfortable Hug’ At Ozzfest Press Conference http://blogs.etcanada.com/sharon-and-ozzy-share-worlds-most-uncomfortable-hug-at-ozzfest-press-conference/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/sharon-and-ozzy-share-worlds-most-uncomfortable-hug-at-ozzfest-press-conference/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 01:44:29 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195355 After their recent split after 33 years of marriage, Sharon and Ozzy Osbourne have reunited for business purposes.

RELATED: Sharon Caught Ozzy Cheating By Reading His Emails

Sharon may soon be Ozzy’s ex-wife, but she continues to be his manager, and joined him onstage at the Hollywood Palladium for a press conference (planned months in advance of their split) to promote Black Sabbath’s highly anticipated performance at the 20th anniversary of Ozzfest in September.

“Ozzy walked out on stage and gave Sharon the world’s most uncomfortable hug from behind,” a source tells “People” of the press conference. “Sharon literally cringed as Ozzy wrapped his arms around her before taking his seat.”

RELATED: Sharon Osbourne Gets Candid On ‘The Talk’ About Her Split From Ozzy

An inside source tells “People” that Sharon is not having an easy time with the situation. “I don’t know how much more she can take,” says the source. “It just weighs you down.”

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/sharon-and-ozzy-share-worlds-most-uncomfortable-hug-at-ozzfest-press-conference/feed/ 0 Ryan Gosling Talks Baby #2 And ‘Hey Girl’ Meme On ‘Ellen’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/ryan-gosling-talks-baby-2-and-hey-girl-meme-on-ellen/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/ryan-gosling-talks-baby-2-and-hey-girl-meme-on-ellen/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 01:36:18 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195349 The studio audience went wild as Canadian actor Ryan Gosling joins “The Ellen Degeneres Show” during the taping for tomorrow’s show, discussing his newborn daughter and sharing an odd experience that took place in his dressing room.

RELATED: New Dad Ryan Gosling On Fatherhood: ‘I Never Knew Life Could Be This Great’

After receiving the news about Gosling’s expanding family, Ellen asked to see a photo, which the “The Nice Guys” star graciously shares — hilariously, of course.

Ellen then brings up the famous “Hey Girl” Internet meme of Gosling, and the actor explained how he first discovered that he had become a meme.

RELATED: Ryan Gosling ‘The Nice Guys’

“I found out about it in an odd way, because I didn’t know what it was and people would just say, ‘Hey girl,’” Gosling explains. “They would just scream it across the street, ‘Hey girl!’ so it took me a while to figure it out.”

Calling Gosling “hottt,” Ellen expresses to her audience that she told her staff to “be on their best behaviours” during Gosling’s appearance. The comment was followed by a clip of the actor in his dressing room, with a few staffers going undercover by masquerading as a lamp, a plant and a painting.

The full interview will air in tomorrow’s edition of “The Ellen DeGeneres Show”.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/ryan-gosling-talks-baby-2-and-hey-girl-meme-on-ellen/feed/ 0 And The Season 4 Winner Of ‘Big Brother Canada’ Is… http://blogs.etcanada.com/and-the-season-4-winner-of-big-brother-canada-is/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/and-the-season-4-winner-of-big-brother-canada-is/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 01:28:17 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195331 SPOILER ALERT: You do NOT want to keep reading if you haven’t yet watched tonight’s two-hour season finale of “Big Brother Canada”, because some huuuuuge spoilers lie ahead.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The night fans have been waiting for finally arrived, bringing us a threeway showdown nobody could have predicted when the season began: Kelsey (“the comeback kid”) vs. brothers Phil and Nick (“the longshots”) and wildcard “Big Brother Australia” winner Tim (“the legend”).

The finale kicked off with an arctic-themed puzzle challenge that left Kelsey in the dust — or, as the case may be, fake snow. In a subsequent challenge testing the remaining contenders’ knowledge of their fellow houseguests, it was Tim who found himself stymied, and ultimately forfeited. This was followed by a “Tron”-like game show to test the finalists’ knowledge of the jury.

The first evictee of the night was Tim, who shared his feelings on the “Big Brother Canada” experience with host Arisa Cox.

Related: Surprise Eviction Rocks ‘Big Brother Canada’ The Day Before Finale

“The whole game it was that decision, ‘I could lie, I could manipulate, I could win!’ But is that what I actually came here for? I just came here for an adventure, and I got that.”

Finally it was time for Kelsey and the brothers to undergo an intense cross-examination by the jury, who asked all manner of probing questions that yielded often-surprising answers (and we even got an update on Ramsey’s dad, who is apparently doing much better after suffering a heart attack several weeks ago).

After the votes were tallied, this season’s winner of “Big Brother Canada” was revealed to be…

 

 

 

 

 

 

… Nick and Phil, marking the first time two people have simultaneously won, with the Ottawa bros set to retunr home a $100,000 richer.

Following the finale, ET Canada’s Jake Mossop chatted with Nick and Phil about their winning strategy:

And that’s all folks, until “Big Brother Canada” returns with a fifth season in 2017.

 

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/and-the-season-4-winner-of-big-brother-canada-is/feed/ 0 ‘Castle’ Cancelled Amidst Rumours Of Behind-The-Scenes Drama http://blogs.etcanada.com/castle-cancelled-amidst-rumours-of-behind-the-scenes-drama/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/castle-cancelled-amidst-rumours-of-behind-the-scenes-drama/#comments Fri, 13 May 2016 00:23:24 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195337 The fate of “Castle” has been hanging by a thread over the past few weeks, and now it’s official: “Castle” has been cancelled after eight seasons.

The writing appeared to be on the wall when it was announced that if ABC were to go ahead with a ninth season, it would be without star Stana Katic, who’s played Det. Kate Beckett since the series began.

Related: ‘Castle’ Shocker: Stana Katic Exiting Series After 8 Seasons

Katic’s exit came amidst tabloid reports of tension on the set between her and Nathan Fillion, who plays crime-solving novelist Richard Castle, with “Us Weekly” reporting that the actors’ relationship had deteriorated to the point that the network ordered the pair to undergo couples counselling (Fillion didn’t respond to the story, while Katic’s rep said she had “absolutely no issues” with her co-star).

Related: Nathan Fillion Remarks On Stana Katic’s Departure From ‘Castle’

Given the uncertainty over the series’ future, “The Hollywood Reporter” notes that two different endings were filmed for this Monday’s season finale, one that would have served as a springboard to season nine and another that wraps up the series, which is clearly the ending viewers will see next week.

Check out this interview from the ET Canada archives, featuring Katic on the “Castle” set.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/castle-cancelled-amidst-rumours-of-behind-the-scenes-drama/feed/ 0 Drake Surprises ‘SNL’ Cast With Dinner By Bobby Flay http://blogs.etcanada.com/drake-surprises-snl-cast-with-dinner-by-bobby-flay/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/drake-surprises-snl-cast-with-dinner-by-bobby-flay/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 23:18:04 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195327 Just when we thought Drake couldn’t get any better comes a report that “Toronto’s sweetheart” graciously surprised the ‘SNL’ cast with a gournet dinner courtesy of a celebrity chef.

RELATED: Drake Wants To Do Adele’s Laundry

The record-breaking artist is set to host this week’s edition of “Saturday Night Live” for the second time, and to give thanks to the team at the show, Drake organized a tasty treat cooked up by none other than Food Network Canada star Bobby Flay.

Don’t be so shy @bobbyflay !!!!

A photo posted by Jay Pharoah (@jaypharoah) on May 11, 2016 at 6:11pm PDT

‘SNL’ stars Cecily Strong and Jay Pharaoh expressed their excitement via Instagram, giving thanks to Drake while showing off the yummy spread.

RELATED: Drake’s T-Mobile Super Bowl Commercial

DRAKE GAVE US A BOBBY FLAY DINNER AND THIS IS THE BEST DAY OF ALL OF OUR LIVES FBDBFBSNDNVXJSK

A photo posted by Cecily Strong (@cecilystrong) on May 11, 2016 at 5:33pm PDT

If Drake’s previous appearance on the show is any indication of what is to come, then we are in for quite the funny treat this week when he returns to Studio 8H.

‘Saturday Night Live’ airs Saturdays at 11:35 p.m. ET/PT on Global.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/drake-surprises-snl-cast-with-dinner-by-bobby-flay/feed/ 0 Gwyneth Paltrow’s Goop Recommends $15,000 Gold Sex Toy http://blogs.etcanada.com/gwyneth-paltrows-goop-recommends-15000-gold-sex-toy/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/gwyneth-paltrows-goop-recommends-15000-gold-sex-toy/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 23:17:50 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=194773 Gwyneth Paltrow and her Goop lifestyle website are raising eyebrows yet again thanks to their extravagant taste in sex toys.

Goop recently included the LELO “Inez” — a $15,000, 24-karat gold dildo — on their list of “Not-So-Basic-Sex-Toys,” which according to the site is “for women who demand the ultimate in luxurious indulgence.”

RELATED: Robert Downey Jr. Says Gwyneth Paltrow Is His ‘Free Pass’

“Sex toys have long since graduated from the floppy rubber things you hide in your bedside table to beautiful works of interactive art,” the roundup read. “Below, a few of our favourites for all scenarios.”

For those worried about the product’s longevity, the expensive bedroom companion comes complete with a 10-year warranty and “free discreet shipping.” Phew!

RELATED: WATCH: Gwyneth Paltrow Joins James Corden For Some ‘Toddlerography’

A stainless steel option, coming in at $7,900, is also available for shoppers with a slightly less extravagant budget.

Check out the Goop-approved list of sex toys here.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/gwyneth-paltrows-goop-recommends-15000-gold-sex-toy/feed/ 0 Hayden Panettiere Re-Enters Treatment For Ongoing Postpartum Depression http://blogs.etcanada.com/hayden-panettiere-re-enters-treatment-for-ongoing-postpartum-depression/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/hayden-panettiere-re-enters-treatment-for-ongoing-postpartum-depression/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 23:09:36 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195321 Hayden Panettiere is currently pursuing further treatment for postpartum depression, following treatment she already underwent back in October 2015. The young actress broke the news herself via Twitter today.

pic.twitter.com/DwCq4c5XJf

— hayden panettiere (@haydenpanettier) May 12, 2016

RELATED: Celebrities Who Have Overcome Postpartum Depression

“The postpartum depression I have been experiencing has impacted every aspect of my life,” she tweeted. “Rather than stay stuck due to unhealthy coping mechanisms I have chosen to take time to reflect holistically on my health and life. Wish me luck!”

The 26-year-old has been relatively vocal about her struggles with postpartum depression ever since welcoming her daughter, Kaya, in December 2014.

RELATED: Hayden Panettiere On Reliving Her Postpartum Depression on ‘Nashville’

“Hayden Panettiere is voluntarily seeking professional help at a treatment center as she is currently battling postpartum depression,” her reps told “Us Weekly” last October. “She asks that the media respect her privacy during this time.”

In an appearance on “Live With Kelly and Michael” in September 2015, the actress became quite candid about the topic; explaining how she relates to other women who suffer similarly.

RELATED: Hayden Panettiere Begins Treatment For Postpartum Depression

“I can very much relate. It’s something a lot of women experience. When [you’re told] about postpartum depression you think it’s ‘I feel negative feelings towards my child, I want to injure or hurt my child.’ I’ve never, ever had those feelings,” she revealed. “Some women do. But you don’t realize how broad of a spectrum you can really experience that on. It’s something that needs to be talked about. Women need to know that they’re not alone, and that it does heal.”

Sources say that the “Nashville” star is currently seeking professional help in Utah.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/hayden-panettiere-re-enters-treatment-for-ongoing-postpartum-depression/feed/ 0 Melissa Rivers Settles Malpractice Lawsuit Over Mom Joan’s Death http://blogs.etcanada.com/melissa-rivers-settles-malpractice-lawsuit-over-mom-joans-death/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/melissa-rivers-settles-malpractice-lawsuit-over-mom-joans-death/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 23:04:03 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195310 Melissa Rivers has settled the medical-malpractice lawsuit over her mother Joan’s death, nearly two years after the legendary comedian passed away.

The elder Rivers went under the knife for a routine throat procedure in an outpatient clinic that ultimately left her in a coma before daughter Melissa removed her from life support.

RELATED: Melissa Rivers Blasts Kathy Griffin: ‘She Sh*t All Over My Mother’s Legacy’

Today news comes that Rivers has settled the multi-million dollar lawsuit. “In accepting this settlement, I am able to put the legal aspects of my mother’s death behind me and ensure that those culpable for her death have accepted responsibility for their actions quickly and without equivocation,” Melissa said in a statement.

“Moving forward, my focus will be to ensure that no one ever has to go through what my mother, Cooper and I went through and I will work towards ensuring higher safety standards in outpatient surgical clinics,” she said, referring to her teenage son.

Rivers settled for an undisclosed amount.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/melissa-rivers-settles-malpractice-lawsuit-over-mom-joans-death/feed/ 0 ‘The Good Wife’ Spinoff Expected To Hit CBS All Access http://blogs.etcanada.com/the-good-wife-spinoff-expected-to-hit-cbs-all-access/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/the-good-wife-spinoff-expected-to-hit-cbs-all-access/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 22:46:38 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195302 “The Good Wife” fans, rejoice!

CBS is in final talks to launch a spinoff of the popular series, with Christine Baranski’s Diane Lockhart character taking centre stage, Variety reports.

While sources warn that the deal is still being negotiated and may not reach the air, if the project eventually gets the green light, the new series is expected to air on CBS All Access, with British actress Cush Jumbo also set to star.
 
RELATED: ‘The Good Wife’ Ending After Nine More Episodes
 
Original “The Good Wife” co-creators/executive producers Robert and Michelle King are slated to co-write the new show and will serve as executive producers.

If all goes according to plan, the series would mark another success for the SVOD service and is a strong sign of the network’s commitment to the platform. All Access has already locked down an original “Star Trek” series which is set to premiere in January.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/the-good-wife-spinoff-expected-to-hit-cbs-all-access/feed/ 0 Chris Pratt Calls Kurt Russell ‘The F***ing Best’ As He Wraps ‘Guardians Of The Galaxy 2′ http://blogs.etcanada.com/chris-pratt-calls-kurt-russell-the-f-ing-best-as-he-wraps-guardians-of-the-galaxy-2/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/chris-pratt-calls-kurt-russell-the-f-ing-best-as-he-wraps-guardians-of-the-galaxy-2/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 22:23:38 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195299 Chris Pratt is dishing out high praise for “Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2″ co-star Kurt Russell.

Russell, who will appear in an as of yet-undisclosed role in the film, wrapped his scenes earlier this week. There’s been lots of speculation as to whom exactly Russell will be playing in the sequel to 2014’s monstrous marvel hit. Speculation has it that Russell has been cast as the father of Pratt’s character, Peter “Star Lord” Quill. There’s no word on whether his character will be a hero or a villain.

RELATED: Chris Pratt Gives A Hilarious Tour Of ‘Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2′ Set

Pratt isn’t the only original cast member who is returning for the sequel. Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Karen Gillen, Michael Rooker and fan-favourites Vin Diesel as Groot and Bradley Cooper as Rocket Raccoon all reprise their roles, as will writer-director James Gunn.

Gunn and Pratt gave Russell the social media send-off yesterday after he wrapped his final scenes.

 

And that’s a wrap on Kurt Russell on #GOTGVol2. A true talent and pleasure in every way. I will admit to a small tear in my eye.

— James Gunn (@JamesGunn) May 11, 2016

You’re not the only one cryin’. Kurt Russell is the fucking best. https://t.co/nZVBX3Tjpy — chris pratt (@prattprattpratt) May 11, 2016

I’m sorry for the language. But when I’m talking about how fuckingreat Kurt Russell is I have to swear.

— chris pratt (@prattprattpratt) May 11, 2016

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/chris-pratt-calls-kurt-russell-the-f-ing-best-as-he-wraps-guardians-of-the-galaxy-2/feed/ 0 Justin Bieber Spotted Chilling Solo In Ottawa Ahead Of Friday Concert http://blogs.etcanada.com/justin-bieber-spotted-chilling-in-ottawa-park-before-his-concert/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/justin-bieber-spotted-chilling-in-ottawa-park-before-his-concert/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 22:03:47 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195290 Days after appearing barefoot on the streets of Boston, Justin Bieber was kicking back soaking in some rays in the nation’s capital this week.

Sporting overalls and shades, the “Sorry” singer was spotted chilling out alone, listening to live music near the Parliament buildings. The Ontario-born singer is set to perform in concert at the Canadian Tire Centre in Ottawa on Friday night.

RELATED: Justin Bieber Refuses To Take Photos With Fans

Bieber seems to be enjoying his time outdoors of late, with fans snapping photos of him in a park in Boston, feeding a squirrel, climbing a tree and lounging on the grass.

Earlier this week, the singer posted a note on his Instagram account comparing himself to a “zoo animal” when fans approached him to take a photo before saying “hello.” It seems as though Bieber is sticking to his “no photos” policy. Witnesses say a fan approached him for a snap while in the Ottawa park and he declined.

Bieber previously announced he was cancelling all meet and greets with fans on his Purpose tour, making it even harder for fans to get a sanctioned photo with the star.

https://t.co/WMf8Lf7W9F

— ET Canada (@ETCanada) May 12, 2016

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/justin-bieber-spotted-chilling-in-ottawa-park-before-his-concert/feed/ 0 Jodie Foster And Julia Roberts Hold Back Tears During ‘Money Monster’ Standing Ovation At Cannes http://blogs.etcanada.com/jodie-foster-and-julia-roberts-hold-back-tears-during-money-monster-standing-ovation-at-cannes/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/jodie-foster-and-julia-roberts-hold-back-tears-during-money-monster-standing-ovation-at-cannes/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 21:45:54 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195282 Jodie Foster and Julia Roberts appeared to get emotional after receiving a four-minute standing ovation for their new financial thriller “Money Monster” on Thursday at Cannes. A big feat, seeing as Woody Allen’s “Cafe Society” only received a three-minute standing ovation on Wednesday’s opening night.

According to reports, Foster, who directed the film, appeared to be holding back tears, while Roberts, who acted in the film, was also seen with watery eyes. This was Roberts’ first time attending the Cannes Film Festival, walking the red carpet with the film’s stars, George Clooney, who was accompanied by his wife Amal Clooney, Jack O’Connell, Dominic West and Caitriona Balfe.

Related: EXCLUSIVE: Julia Roberts and George Clooney Stand Up for the Little Guy in ‘Money Monster’

Following the film screening, the crowd reportedly erupted into applause for the film’s antagonist O’Connell when he appeared on the big screen from a camera feed. The elite viewing crowd consisted of Jessica Chastain, Susan Sarandon, Naomi Watts, Diego Luna, Julianne Moore, Universal Music Group boss Lucian Grainge and CAA’s Bryan Lourd and Kevin Huvane.

“Money Monster” stars Clooney, who plays an investment adviser on a financial television show who is taken hostage by an angry investor, played by O’Connell, during a live broadcast and with the help of his producer, played by Roberts, must find a way to diffuse the situation.

Foster recently spoke with ET Canada at Cannes about how becoming a director was the biggest risk of her career.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/jodie-foster-and-julia-roberts-hold-back-tears-during-money-monster-standing-ovation-at-cannes/feed/ 0 Kendall Jenner Reveals She’s Caught ‘Bieber Fever’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/kendall-jenner-reveals-shes-caught-bieber-fever/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/kendall-jenner-reveals-shes-caught-bieber-fever/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 21:20:08 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195293 Kendall Jenner has caught “Bieber Fever” and she isn’t afraid to show it!

When ET caught up Graham at the 2016 Forbes Women’s Summit in New York City on Thursday, we asked her about the sexy post and she says it was all about sending a message of body positivity.

“When I’m on set, the world is my oyster and you can’t tell me anything,” she told ET. “I don’t care how many dimples are in my booty. I’m going to be on a yacht, always dancing with all of my friends.”

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/katy-perry-tweets-a-very-pointed-song-following-orlando-bloom-and-selena-gomez-club-pics/feed/ 0 Prince William Is ‘Committed’ To Helping Prevent Male Suicide http://blogs.etcanada.com/prince-william-is-committed-to-helping-prevent-male-suicide/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/prince-william-is-committed-to-helping-prevent-male-suicide/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 19:16:28 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195178 The Duke of Cambridge says he is “staggered” by the high suicide rate for males in the UK and is “committed” to helping prevent suicides.

Earlier today, Prince William attended a meeting for the Campaign Against Living Miserably (CALM), a UK-based charity that is dedicated to tackling male suicide.

RELATED: Queen Elizabeth II Calls Chinese Officials ‘Very Rude’ To British Ambassador

“Doing my charity work I’ve come across issues like this before and, coupled with my air ambulance work where my first job was actually to a suicide, I realized then really starkly how big a problem we have in this country and globally to be fair,” the Prince said during the meeting with CALM. “But it was really presented to me on that first day and one of the guys told me that there are on average around about five suicides a day, or attempted suicides at least a day, in East Anglia alone.”

The Duke of Cambridge spent time with various workers who deal with the aftermath of male suicide attempts.

RELATED: Kate Middleton Reveals Name of Prince George and Princess Charlotte’s New Royal Pet

Prince William hopes to raise awareness about the crisis and the effects of suicide on the friends and family of the victim: “My plea really is just to get more men talking about their issues before it’s too late and to stop feeling so strong and unable to seek help because it can destroy families, it can destroy lives and I – I think as you all are committed to – want to try and prevent that”.

]]> http://blogs.etcanada.com/watch-keith-urban-shares-hilarious-throwback-thursday-pic-on-ellen/feed/ 0 Singer Corinne Bailey Rae Opens Up About Becoming A Widow At 29: ‘I Felt Like I Lost Everything’ http://blogs.etcanada.com/singer-corinne-bailey-rae-opens-up-about-becoming-a-widow-at-29-i-felt-like-i-lost-everything/ http://blogs.etcanada.com/singer-corinne-bailey-rae-opens-up-about-becoming-a-widow-at-29-i-felt-like-i-lost-everything/#comments Thu, 12 May 2016 17:46:33 +0000 https://blogs.etcanada.com/?p=195193 Losing a spouse is never easy, but is especially painful when the death comes while still in one’s 20s, as a couple is beginning their life together.

Such was the case for singer Corinne Bailey Rae, who opens up in a new interview with “People” about losing her first husband to an accidental overdose when she was just 29.

“I felt like I lost everything, like I’d lost my whole life,” says Rae, now 37.

“I was in so much pain. I was numb,” she adds. “I had family putting food in front of me and just literally looking after me on a day-to-day basis.”

As she tells “People”, getting over the heartbreak wasn’t easy, but was helped by the passage of time.

“You feel like the pain will last forever, like, ‘What’s the point of any of it?'” she says. “The awful thing never gets smaller, but your life gets bigger to support it.”

You can read more in the latest issue of “People”, available on newsstands tomorrow.
